title: 2 Bedrooms 1/2 block to Metro-North  Extra 1/2 Bath!!
posting_body: ['2 BEDROOM APT.', 'LOCATED JUST A 1/2 BLOCK FROM WOODLAWN METRO-NORTH TRAIN STATION!!', 'Extra 1/2 Bathroom En Suit!!', '2 person Jacuzzi in 2nd Bathroom !!!', 'Hardwood floors.', 'Chandelier lighting', 'Crown moldings throughout apt', 'Laundry in building.', 'Stainless steel appliances Including Dishwasher and built-in microwave!', 'Heat and hot water included.', 'LARGE CLOSETS!!!', 'WOODLAWN METRO NORTH TRAIN STATION JUST a 1/2 block away!!', 'NO PETS', 'By owner -No brokers please!!', '700 plus credit score required!!', 'EMAIL CONTACT INFORMATION INCLUDING DAYTIME TELEPHONE NUMBER, OCCUPATION, # OF OCCUPANTS, AND TIME AVAILABLE TO VIEW APARTMENT', 'Convenient to: Van Cortlandt Park, Norwood, Riverdale, Jerome Ave, Westchester, White Plains, Mosholu Golf Coarse, Yankee Stadium, Montefiore Medical Center-North Division, Einstein Hospital, Jacobi Hospital, North Central Bronx Hospital, Bronx Lebanon Hospital, St. Barnabas Hospital, VA Hospital, Bronx Zoo, Botanical Gardens, Fordham University, Pace University, Columbia University, NYU (New York University), Manhattan College, Lehman College, City College, Sarah Lawrence College.']
